title: Transactions not happening for QBFT deployment in aws

labels.name: non mainnet (private networks)
labels.description: not related to mainnet features - covers privacy, permissioning, IBFT2, QBFT

body: Can you provide any logs of what is happening on the Besu nodes?

peers are showing , but they are getting sync and I am unable to send tokens in metamask , and they were keep on going as pending

Hey @rkdevstack ,
Can you plz change your qbft config to -
```
"qbft" : {
      "blockperiodseconds" : 2,
      "epochlength" : 30000,
      "requesttimeoutseconds" : 4
    }
```

Also, delete data first and restart the nodes again
